formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AMI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Action: ExtensionState Synopsis: Check Extension Status Privilege: call,all Description: Report the extension state for given extension. If the extension has a hint, will use devicestate to check the status of the device connected to the extension. Variables: (Names marked with * are required) *Exten: Extension to check state on *Context: Context for extension ActionId: Optional ID for this transaction Will return an "Extension Status" message. The response will include the hint for the extension and the status.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,6 +1,6 @@ Action: ExtensionState Synopsis: Check Extension Status - Privilege: call,all + Privilege: call,reporting,all Description: Report the extension state for given extension. If the extension has a hint, will use devicestate to check the status of the device connected to the extension.
